document.full_text: north korean leader kim jong-il is willing to hold talks without preconditions on "any" issue, former president jimmy carter said at the end of a trip to pyongyang to try to defuse tensions on the divided peninsula.
document.title: n.korean leader ready to restart talks on any issue, carter says
lines_and_colors: north korean leader kim jong-il is willing to hold talks without preconditions on "any" issue, former president jimmy carter said at the end of a trip to pyongyang to try to defuse tensions on the divided peninsula.
